subtitles: 15473 17809 First, there was darkness.
19352 22188 Then came the Strangers.

22230 25025 They were a race
as old as time itself.

26067 28737 They had mastered
the ultimate technology--

28820 34075 the ability to alter
physical reality by will alone.

34075 36745 They called this ability
"Tuning."
37912 39748 But they were dying.

39831 42876 Their civilization was
in decline,

42876 45628 and so they abandoned
their world,

45670 48340 seeking a cure
for their own mortality.

49716 53178 Their endless journey brought
them to a small, blue world...

53261 55347 in the farthest corner
of the galaxy.
56389 57849 Our world.

58892 60894 Here, they thought
they had finally found...

60935 62896 what they had been
searching for.

73740 76576 My name is
Dr. Daniel Poe Schreber.
77577 79245 I am just a man.

79287 82082 I help the Strangers
conduct their experiments.
83625 85752 I have betrayed my own kind.
293168 295003 You are confused, aren't you?

295045 297839 Frightened. That's all right.
I can help you.

297839 299507 -Who is this?
-I'm a doctor.

299507 302218 You must listen to me.
You have lost your memory.

302260 304387 There was an experiment.
Something went wrong.

304429 306598 Your memory was erased.
Do you understand me?

306681 308725 No, I don't understand.
What's going on here?

308725 311561 There are people coming for you
as we speak.

311561 313897 Don't let them find you.
Leave now.
315106 317275 Hello? Are you there?

359442 361945 Hey, Mr. Murdoch,
the Automat called.
361945 363446 Said you left your wallet there.

364489 368118 I suggest you retrieve it, since
you only paid for three weeks,
368159 369953 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
371996 373498 I've been here three weeks?

373498 376668 It's right there
in black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
376710 379170 Day and date.

379170 382465 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.

382465 385510 -I'll take care of it later.
-See that you do.

385510 387679 Only thing makes you a guest
in this joint...
387679 389097 is cash on the barrelhead!

406990 409701 House rules.
Three weeks is three weeks.
409743 412287 No days off for good behavior.

423214 426843 Mr. Murdoch, yes?
Where is he?

426885 430347 He just left
not five minutes ago.

436061 440106 When the rumba rhythm
start to play
440190 442359 Dance with me
442400 445403 Make me sway
445445 449407 Like a lazy ocean hugs the shore
449449 451701 Hold me close
451743 454579 Sway me more

454579 458917 Like a flower bending
in the breeze
458958 461378 Bend with me
461419 464255 Sway with ease

464297 468259 When we dance,
you have a way with me
468301 470762 Stay with me
470762 473348 Sway with me

474140 478186 Hey, sweetie, he said he was
your husband's doctor.
478228 479771 He wanted to speak with you.

503211 504754 -Doctor...
-Schreber.

504796 508800 Please, won't you come in?
You must be Emma Murdoch.

510135 513596 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
513638 515098 What is this?

515140 518685 A rather crude experiment
designed to further my studies.

518768 522439 I don't understand. You say
you're my husband's doctor,

522480 524983 but he never
mentioned you to me.

525025 527861 The truth is, John has been
coming to see me...
527861 529362 for quite some time.

529362 532699 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

532782 535827 stemming from
your marital difficulties.

535869 537787 -John told you what happened.
-Yes.

539164 541458 When was the last time
that you saw him?

541499 544377 Three weeks ago.
He packed a suitcase.
544419 546921 He was very angry at me.

546963 549799 I understand how difficult
this must be for you,
549841 551176 but for John's sake,

551217 554179 I would like you to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

554220 557849 It appears that John
has suffered a psychotic break.

557891 561019 -Complete memory loss.
-You can't be serious.

561061 564022 Oh, but I am.
He may be delusional.
564064 565357 Even violent.

566691 570695 If he were to contact you,
you must call me immediately.

570695 573198 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
574908 576117 For himself.

586294 590215 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?
591132 594594 Mr. "J" something Murdoch?

597972 602143 J. Murdoch. What's your name?
Justin? Jerry?

606481 608566 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.

608608 611152 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
Hi. Jack Murdoch.
617534 619285 Got to get a grip on myself.

643351 646771 I told the guy,
cash on the barrelhead.

646771 650108 I said, "Listen,
three weeks is three weeks."

650108 653695 -Where's our lucky winner?
-Upstairs, sir. Room 614.
654988 656322 The call girl.

660952 663830 -Evening, Husselbeck.
-Inspector Bumstead.
663830 665623 Your lace is untied.
676551 678136 Am I glad you're here, sir.

678178 680805 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

680847 683016 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

713922 716466 -Thanks a lot.
-Excuse me.

718885 720720 -Hello?
-Oh, it's you.

721429 724099 -You left your wallet here.
-When did I do that?

724140 726393 -When you was last here.
-When was that?

726434 729771 When you left your wallet.
Expect me to remember?

735610 738405 -Excuse me!
-No, no, seriously.

755755 757590 -Where you headed, chief?
-Home.
757632 758925 And where's home?

758967 761761 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?
761803 764055 I'm just doing my job, May.
764097 766141 There's a killer out there.

766182 768852 Look for him
instead of cooling your heels.
772147 773898 Go on. Get out of here.

787162 789956 What's that make so far?
Six hookers in all?

789956 792876 -I believe so, sir.
-Give the man an "A" for effort.
798340 800633 So, Husselbeck,

800675 807140 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?

807182 809017 -Got me, sir.
-Bumstead.

809059 812395 What took you? This killer's
been running circles around us,
812395 813521 thanks to Walenski.

813563 815357 With all due respect,
Chief lnspector,

815398 818485 I've known Eddie a long time,
and he's a good cop.

818526 820737 Whatever kind of cop
Walenski once was...
820737 822697 he let drift a long time ago.
822739 824532 Let me talk to Bumstead!
824574 826618 Come on! Hold on!

831539 833583 -Get his arm !
-They're watching us!

833625 835877 -On your feet!
-There's no way out!
837295 839005 God, can't you see?

842425 844761 Let me go!
I'm not going to hurt you.

846304 848515 -What was that?
-Walenski.

856898 860068 I'm being punished
for my sins, right?

860068 864406 What did I ever do to inherit
this? Where do you begin?

864406 867409 Well, everything Detective
Walenski committed to paper...
867409 868827 should be here, so--

868910 871454 The only thing that should be
committed is Walenski.

873748 875625 Nothing like
a little healthy paranoia.

882215 885552 I came here to file a missing
persons report for my husband.

885593 888972 -Take it to the front desk.
-They told me to come see you.
891266 892934 His name's John Murdoch.

895979 899357 Do these names mean
anything to you?
900191 902152 Who are these women?

902193 904070 Why are you looking
for my husband?

904112 906364 Are you going to accuse him
of something?

906406 909951 -Maybe. Maybe murder.
-Whose murder?

911369 914622 -Which one?
-All of them.

916041 919336 Mrs. Murdoch, I am sorry.
I didn't mean to alarm you.

919377 922130 I'm sorry that I came.
I just made a mistake.

922172 925967 If you'd please just give me
half a second to explain.
935310 936561 We met before?

938229 941316 If we did,
I hope you're still breathing.
941358 942901 What's your name, honey?

946696 948490 Well, that's
an appropriate name.
956414 957707 I was just thinking.

964714 969761 It seems kind of dangerous...
right now.

969803 971763 How do you know
I'm not the killer?

971763 975016 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

975975 978186 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1039122 1042959 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1043001 1046796 -Who are you?
-We might ask the same question.

1129963 1133133 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.

1133174 1136302 -It is said he is able to Tune.
-Impossible!

1136344 1139389 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1139431 1142267 On occasion, the imprinting
does not take.

1142308 1144894 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1144894 1148565 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1148606 1150734 But this one was different, yes?

1150775 1154571 -What has the doctor to say?
-He has failed to report in.

1154612 1157741 -And Mr. Quick?
-No more Mr. Quick.
1157782 1160410 Mr. Quick...dead, yes.
1163788 1166416 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1166458 1169336 Mr. Book...does he know?
1170337 1172422 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1173465 1176343 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1176343 1179346 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1179346 1181598 We must have this man.
1187562 1188730 My brand, I hope.
1201034 1202619 I've been worried about you.
1206664 1207999 Are you punishing me?

1208750 1211378 If disappearing is
your way of punishing me,
1211419 1212671 I don't appreciate it.
1212671 1213838 What are you talking about?

1217342 1221179 I found these keys in my pocket,
so I assume I live here.

1223348 1225684 -You supposed to be my wife?
-"Supposed to be"?

1229229 1233233 You really...don't know
who I am, do you.

1234067 1236903 Your doctor called me. He was
worried that this might happen.

1241074 1244828 He gave me his card.
He's desperate to find you.

1252585 1254587 Feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1254629 1257424 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1258008 1259509 I had an affair.
1261428 1262762 You were angry at me.

1265932 1269602 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.
1279320 1281656 Most unfortunate it is...

1281740 1283992 that we were forced
to seek you out here.

1284951 1289122 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this moisture.

1289998 1293293 -I'm sorry. I--
-Failed to report in, yes?

1293335 1296296 I was frightened.
I have a weak heart, you know.

1296296 1299841 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.
1299924 1302594 We found this in his hotel room.

1302635 1306139 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1306139 1308308 I tried to reprint him,
but he woke up.

1308350 1310518 He knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.

1310602 1313813 -He has no memories, then?
-Only fragments.

1313813 1315357 The procedure,
it was interrupted.

1315357 1318109 I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1318860 1320528 You have had strays
before, right?

1320612 1324491 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can Tune.

1324491 1327577 But that's impossible.
Only you have that ability.

1327619 1329913 You will process
another template...
1329954 1331998 of the subject's memories, yes?

1332040 1333625 Of course.
I'll imprint him again.

1335210 1338463 We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1338505 1341299 It's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1341341 1343176 We'll talk again
after tonight's Tuning,
1343218 1346137 but no more delays, yes?

1346179 1351017 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1352852 1354521 The police were looking for you.
1354521 1356690 I know. I saw the papers.

1356731 1359192 "Killer stalks
city street-walkers."
1362821 1365156 I was with one of those women.

1366700 1370078 -Before I came here tonight.
-I don't understand.

1370161 1375041 I met her outside an Automat.
I guess I wanted to test myself.

1376751 1380213 I wanted to know if I had it
in me to do those things.
1380213 1381715 Maybe I have lost my mind,

1381756 1384759 but whoever I am, I'm still me,
and I'm not a killer.
1390765 1392100 I believe you.

1399733 1401735 -What?
-The car outside.
1401776 1403236 The one you arrived in.

1403278 1405572 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1407741 1409492 I didn't know he was still here.
1413079 1414539 Hold it right there, mister!

1416958 1419961 -Wait. You have the wrong man.
-Stand aside, will you, please?
1420003 1421463 I didn't kill anyone.

1421504 1423798 Right now,
all you are is a suspect.

1423840 1427093 Turn yourself in. I'll listen
to whatever you have to say.

1427093 1429179 You won't believe
what I have to say.

1430305 1433600 -Try me.
-There's someone after me.

1433600 1437312 It's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1437312 1440148 And I don't even know if...
they're not even--

1440190 1442442 Yeah, who's going to listen
to a madman?

1442484 1444986 -Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
-Run!
1449324 1451284 No one ever listens to me.
1457540 1458625 Murdoch, stop!

1501501 1503837 -How much further?
-We're almost there, buddy.

1507382 1509718 You happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1509759 1512846 You're kidding! Me and the wife
spent our honeymoon there.

1512887 1515390 All you do is
take Main Street West to...

1518393 1521604 Or is it the Cross...
Now, that's funny.

1521688 1524774 I can't seem to remember
if it's Main Street West...
1524858 1526109 or the Crosstown.

1530780 1533867 I'm sorry, lnspector,
I cannot be of more assistance,

1533950 1535910 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1535952 1538079 Well, I appreciate you
taking the time.

1546796 1549215 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1549257 1553803 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.

1553845 1556556 Murdoch doesn't
strike me as one.

1556598 1559768 Perhaps you are not accustomed
to digging deep enough.

1559809 1562687 Well, I do know when
someone is lying to me, Doctor.

1562729 1566941 Inspector, judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1566941 1568943 Maybe you can give me
a few pointers.

1568985 1572947 Certainly.
Let's take you, for instance.

1572989 1576117 You are a fastidious man.
Driven.
1576159 1578453 Consumed by details.

1578495 1581998 I would say
your life is rather lonely.

1581998 1584626 Good evening, lnspector.
I really must be going.

1628461 1630255 -How is he?
-The same.
1631548 1634175 Walenski? It's me, Frank.
1640557 1641766 Come in, Frank.
1645020 1646229 Close the door.

1654279 1657574 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1657615 1659743 It's an interesting case.
1660869 1664080 Kind that make a man's career.

1665790 1669419 -Or break it.
-Yeah. I was on that case.

1669461 1673298 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1673298 1674758 Nothing happened, Frank.

1675800 1677802 I've just been spending time
in the subway,
1677844 1679763 riding in circles.

1679804 1683350 Thinking in circles.
There's no way out.
1685602 1687270 I've been over this entire city.

1691775 1693651 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1693693 1695195 She's not my wife.

1697030 1699991 I don't know who she is
or who any of us are.

1700033 1703411 -What makes you say that?
-You think about the past much?
1705455 1706956 As much as the next guy.

1707957 1710710 See, I've been trying
to remember things--

1710794 1713838 clearly remember things
from my past.

1713880 1716049 But the more
I try to think back,

1716132 1719135 the more it all starts
to unravel.
1719135 1720345 None of it seems real.

1720345 1724516 It's like I've just
been dreaming this life,

1724516 1727477 and when I finally wake up,
I'll be somebody else,
1727477 1729479 somebody totally different.

1733858 1736027 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie.
1737195 1739698 Something to do with the case.

1740323 1743702 There is no case!
There never was!

1743702 1747664 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
1788705 1790457 Tonight's requirements are...
1790540 1793752 12 family photo albums,
1793793 1796254 nine personal diaries,
1798423 1800884 assorted childhood photographs,

1800925 1805096 requisite false l.D.s
and social security cards.
1805138 1807432 These do bring back memories.
1809768 1812062 This one is still warm.

1813980 1817233 The recollections of
a great lover?
1817275 1819569 A catalogue of conquests?
1820278 1821780 We will soon find out.

1823073 1824574 You wouldn't
appreciate that,

1824616 1827827 would you,
Mr. Whatever-your-name is?

1827869 1832165 Not the sort of conquest
you would ever understand.

1835543 1838254 A touch of
unhappy childhood...

1843927 1846513 A dash of
teenage rebellion...
1848098 1851142 And last but not least...

1851184 1853770 a tragic death
in the family.

1865323 1868868 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the Tuning?

1868952 1873164 Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.
1873206 1874457 A freak of nature.

1874499 1877335 He's adapting to survive.
What do you expect?

1877377 1879295 Weren't you looking for
the human soul?

1879337 1881965 Isn't that the purpose
of your little zoo?

1882007 1885343 That's why you change people
and things every night.

1885385 1888221 Maybe you have finally
found what you are looking for,

1888304 1889848 and it's going to bite you
on your--

1893893 1895812 It requires several
of your lifetimes...
1895854 1897522 to master our gifts.

1897564 1899357 The idea that
a simple man...

1899399 1901401 could develop the ability
to Tune is--
1901443 1902569 Absurd, I know.
1902610 1904904 What other explanation is there?
1956998 1958458 Shut it down.

1976935 1980063 Fredrickson says he'll take me
off the night shift.
1980105 1981940 It's about time, dear.
2058058 2060226 Can anyone hear me?
2063396 2066232 Let the Tuning commence.
2226101 2227435 The Goodwins.
2227477 2229479 Charlie, Sylvia,
2229562 2231648 Jane, and little Matthew.
2235485 2237737 Jane and little Matthew.
2267892 2270145 The rich get richer.

2270186 2272272 Probably have
maid's quarters...

2272355 2273690 before the night
is through.
2327285 2329245 Dr. Schreber, I presume.

2331915 2334042 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor,
2334084 2336211 if that's what you are.
2337712 2339547 Why is everyone asleep?
2339589 2341966 Please keep your voice down.

2342008 2343927 I can't remember anything.
What have you done?
2343968 2346763 Nothing. I want to help you.

2346805 2350225 We cannot talk here.
If they see us together--

2350266 2353144 I don't care.
I want some answers. Now!

2353228 2356314 Who are they?
Why are they trying to kill me?

2363655 2366741 -You really can do it.
-I did that?

2366783 2369411 Listen to me.
You have their power.

2369452 2371413 You can make things happen
by will alone.
2371454 2372997 They call it "Tuning."

2373081 2375000 That is how they change
the buildings.

2375083 2377585 Just now you acted
out of self-defense,

2377669 2380422 but I can teach you
to control your power.

2380463 2384426 We can stop them.
We can take the city back.

2443526 2445862 He made a terrible impression
for the firm,

2445904 2448740 Iollygagging around
as he did.

2448782 2451618 So I told Fredrickson
I was letting him go.
2451701 2453703 Well you should have, darling.

2454412 2457457 He attacked me.
I don't know where he's gone.

2457957 2461920 Come, Dr. Schreber.
We have much to do.

2466966 2473390 They say that
you're a runaround lover
2474474 2482524 Though you say it isn't so

2485402 2492242 But if you put me down
for another
2493910 2499749 I'll know, believe me, I'll know

2501251 2504754 Tonight's experiment will
take place in these locations.

2504796 2508800 The first subject
shall be imprinted on Avenue M.
2508842 2511845 Mr. Book, there is a problem.
2511928 2513471 There is no Avenue M.

2513513 2515432 We were unable
to complete it.

2515473 2518935 During the last Tuning,
we detected a lack of control.

2518977 2522188 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2522272 2526484 This man Murdoch is
more powerful than we thought.
2526526 2528486 He is becoming like us.
2528486 2531948 So we must become like him.
2532866 2535201 The doctor has done as we asked?

2535243 2538955 The life and times
of John Murdoch, volume two.
2540957 2543543 We must not do this.

2543585 2546963 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2547005 2549841 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2549883 2553303 Everywhere he goes,
everyone he seeks out...
2553345 2554596 will be known to us.

2554637 2559768 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.
2559851 2562228 But to imprint one of us?
2562270 2565023 Failure has always resulted.

2565023 2568568 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2575700 2577577 This may sting a bit.
2618284 2622122 I have John Murdoch in mind.

2624416 2628420 "Found this postcard
among your mother's things.

2628461 2630755 "Brings back memories,
doesn't it?
2630755 2632590 "Stop by sometime.

2632632 2635927 "We'll see if we can't
hook ourselves another mermaid.
2635969 2638263 "Love to Emma. Karl."
2646646 2648314 Karl Harris.

2665832 2668877 Excuse me.
Which way is Avenue C?
2668877 2670170 Try the subway.
2673882 2675383 You got a problem, pal?
2675425 2678261 Been working here long?

2678303 2681639 25 years.
No days off for good behavior.
2706748 2709668 We're looking for John Murdoch.

2743952 2746037 She knows nothing,
Mr. Hand.
2746079 2747914 A dead end, Mr. Wall.

2747956 2750709 We thought his imprint
would let us track him.

2750750 2753253 But instead
we have been brought here.

2753294 2757340 -This is irrational.
-Instincts are irrational.

2757382 2760677 We must follow
where they lead, yes?

2760719 2763972 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar.
2765390 2767434 He does not care about our job.
2767434 2770270 Indulge us, Mr. Hand.
2770311 2772981 If you were Murdoch, yes?
2773023 2776359 If I were Murdoch...

2778153 2781656 I would remember how
my wife had hurt me...
2781698 2783783 by sleeping with another man.

2788705 2792167 I would look for a way
to hurt her in return.

2795170 2799716 Leave me alone with her.
There's work to be done.

2803386 2805513 All change,
platform three.

2809351 2811686 Excuse me, how do I get
to the end of the line?
2811686 2813188 You want the Express.
2825742 2828203 How come the train didn't stop?
2828244 2829537 That's the Express.
2831081 2832999 There's no way out.

2833041 2835835 You can't get out of the city.
I've tried.
2836961 2839047 You're Murdoch, aren't you?

2839089 2840757 The one
they've been looking for.
2840799 2841925 You're not a killer.

2842008 2844678 They set you up with
a fake identity,
2844719 2846346 Iike everyone else here.

2846388 2848348 -Who are you?
-I was a cop.
2848348 2851518 At least in this life I was.
2851518 2854354 They steal peoples' memories.

2854396 2856231 Then they swap them around
between us.

2856231 2858942 I seen them do it,
back and forth...

2859025 2861111 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
2861194 2862445 How do you know all this?

2862529 2864280 Once in a while one of us
wakes up...
2864364 2865740 while they're changing things.

2866700 2869202 It's not supposed to happen,
but it does.
2869244 2870578 It happened to me.
2871246 2873123 They'll come looking for you.

2874290 2876626 Just like they'll come
looking for me.
2878086 2879295 I figured a way out.
2890765 2892017 They were here.
2895562 2897772 This was to be his home.
2900442 2902235 That was when we loved her.
2902277 2904612 This is all well and good,

2904654 2906656 but we require
a more practical link...
2906698 2908742 to his present whereabouts.
2913371 2915457 And I know where to find her.

2923840 2927177 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

2928303 2930347 To be able to revisit
those places...

2930347 2932349 which meant
